title: Ezhaiyin upacAram
sahitya:
Ezhaiyin upacAram ElaiyA en idayattaik-koLLai koNDa bAlaiyA kaNNA


anupallavi

  kUzhaiyum amudenak-kuDippAi anbar kUrai vITTilum kuDi iruppAi kaNNaiyA


caraNam    viduran kUzhai uNDa caturA en virundai uNNa vA vA madhurA
puduppolivu mighunda kadirA un pughalanri enakkoru ponnillai pugazhillai
